root: ^As you can see, I did not waste your money.
^Thanks to you I have opened my store.
^And I'd like to offer a special product just for you - the Death Note.
^I hope it's gonna help you with those monsters outside.
^Just place it on the white plate, which will show you the cost and then needed amount of money on the green.
^Yeah, sorry, I can't just give it to you...
^That's a very rare and expensive thingy.
